# Silk Ride - London's Premier Luxury Chauffeur Service

> Premium chauffeur service in London offering luxury airport transfers, executive car hire, wedding transport, and corporate travel. Mercedes fleet with professional drivers, available 24/7.

## Quick Facts

- **Company**: Silk Ride Ltd
- **Location**: London, United Kingdom
- **Service Area**: London, UK & Europe
- **Phone**: +44 7512 905514
- **Email**: info@silkride.co.uk
- **Website**: https://silkride.co.uk
- **Operating Hours**: 24/7, 365 days a year
- **License**: Licensed Private Hire Operator

## Fleet

Silk Ride operates a luxury Mercedes fleet:

- **Mercedes E-Class**: Executive saloon, up to 3 passengers, ideal for business travel
- **Mercedes S-Class**: Flagship luxury limousine, up to 3 passengers, VIP transport
- **Mercedes V-Class**: Luxury MPV, up to 7 passengers, perfect for groups & families

All vehicles feature: leather interiors, climate control, complimentary Wi-Fi, phone chargers, bottled water.

## Services & Pricing

### Airport Transfers
Premium transfers to all London airports with meet & greet, flight tracking, and complimentary waiting time.

- **Heathrow Airport**: From £120 | https://silkride.co.uk/airport-transfers/heathrow
- **Gatwick Airport**: From £130 | https://silkride.co.uk/airport-transfers/gatwick
- **Stansted Airport**: From £140 | https://silkride.co.uk/airport-transfers/stansted
- **Luton Airport**: From £130 | https://silkride.co.uk/airport-transfers/luton

Includes: 60 min free waiting (international), 45 min (domestic), meet & greet, flight monitoring.

### Hourly Chauffeur Hire
Flexible as-directed service for business, shopping, or sightseeing.

- **Rate**: From £50/hour (4-hour minimum)
- **Page**: https://silkride.co.uk/services/hourly-chauffeur

### Corporate Travel
Executive transport for business professionals, meetings, and roadshows.

- **Page**: https://silkride.co.uk/services/corporate-travel

### Wedding Chauffeur
Luxury wedding car hire with ribbon decorations and champagne service.

- **Page**: https://silkride.co.uk/services/wedding-chauffeur

### Event Transport
VIP transport for concerts, galas, theatre, and sporting events.

- **Page**: https://silkride.co.uk/services/event-chauffeur

### UK & Europe Travel
Long-distance chauffeur service across the UK and Europe.

- **Page**: https://silkride.co.uk/services/uk-europe-travel

## Popular Day Trips from London

Private chauffeur tours to popular UK destinations:

- **Oxford**: Historic university city | https://silkride.co.uk/destination-tours/oxford
- **Cambridge**: Colleges & River Cam | https://silkride.co.uk/destination-tours/cambridge
- **Bath**: Roman Baths & Georgian architecture | https://silkride.co.uk/destination-tours/bath
- **Cotswolds**: Picturesque villages | https://silkride.co.uk/destination-tours/cotswolds
- **Stonehenge**: Prehistoric monument | https://silkride.co.uk/destination-tours/stonehenge

## Why Choose Silk Ride

- **Licensed & Insured**: Fully licensed private hire operator
- **Professional Drivers**: Vetted, trained, PCO-licensed chauffeurs
- **24/7 Availability**: Round-the-clock service, every day of the year
- **Flight Tracking**: Real-time monitoring for airport pickups
- **Fixed Pricing**: No hidden fees, transparent quotes
- **Luxury Fleet**: Immaculate Mercedes vehicles
